description: This table contains the heart status information for a transplant episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HEART_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient's heart status value as defined by the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


2 (retired 2018)


1A (retired 2018)


1B (retired 2018)


7 (Inactive)


2 (Pediatric)


1B (Pediatric)


1A (Pediatric)


6 (Adult)


5 (Adult)


4 (Adult)


3 (Adult)


2 (Adult)


1 (Adult)

columns.name: HEART_STATUS_DT
columns.description: Date on which the patient's heart status value was last updated.

columns.name: HR_ST_RSN_OTHER
columns.description: Free-text reason for the patient's heart status.
